content: In the third quarter, revenues from our battery business reached about $25.8 million, up by roughly 170%. In the third quarter, our net revenues surged by 500% to $57.7 million from the same period of 2021, primarily due to growing sales in our battery products and battery materials. Our operating expenses rose by of 14.8% to $4.9 million, primarily due to growing headcount in our new 19 facility and the acquisition of our battery material business, within that, our research and development expenses increased by 31% to $2.4 million.
